name: places/ChIJ_ydOVJpZwokRuw30AQvlcZc
formattedAddress: 436 Lafayette St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 436 Lafayette St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
I signed up for the professional account for one month and had the date written down when the plan would renew, so I had plans to cancel the day before. The day I woke up to cancel the subscription, I had been charged at 2:45 am and I never got a receipt or even a renewal reminder! I immediately filed a dispute with PayPal, which they're looking into. I also sent an email to Animoto about this and stated I expected a refund in 24-hours. Savannah Frazier sent me a kind response that she would forward my message to the billing department. I thanked her and waited patiently for my refund or a response, and I haven't heard anything!!! So, essentially I have paid $68.90 to use their professional plan, which I haven't used because I no longer need it, and I feel like they have stolen money from me.

I have sent messages to Savannah with no response, which I find unprofessional for such a large company.

An email reminder would have been helpful too.

I get email reminders for EVERYTHING, so I don't know why this is so difficult and I didn't even get a receipt.

I feel like Animoto is out to rip people off instead of providing better customer service.

I would give them 0 stars, but it was not an option.

I also filed a complaint with the BBB. Apparently, I'm not the only that Animoto has had issues with because they are several complaints filed against them.

originalText.text: I had the product for 10 years and all of the sudden my subscription was cancelled and I have no access to the videos I made. One person contacted me and asked for more information and I never heard from her again. I like what they have but am getting very frustrated at the incompetence of customer service. Just hire more people to answer a phone or at least respond to emails. I’m amazed that this is allowed.

originalText.text: Went to visit a friend and this place is so cool. They have such a staff friendly office space and just cool vibes overall. They have different themed meeting rooms. Their main room is currently game of thrones themed.

originalText.text: Do not use this company - no customer support - continues to charge 6 months after canceling!
